item.title: Sacking 2019
item.description:
Source: TW

Ex-TTD chief priest Ramana Deekshitulu who was sacked, re-appointed in Tirumala

Deekshitulu was unceremoniously sacked last year after making allegations of financial irregularities in the TTD.

Ex-TTD chief priest Ramana Deekshitulu who was sacked, re-appointed in Tirumala

Written by:TNM Staff Published on: 06 Nov 2019, 9:39 am The Tirumala Tirupati Devasthanam (TTD) which governs affairs at the Sri Venkateswara temple atop Tirumala in Andhra Pradesh, on Tuesday, reinstated former chief priest Dr A V Ramana Deekshitulu, who was unceremoniously sacked last year.
